attributes.action: Defend Brexit Freedoms from Starmer's EU Plans!
attributes.additional_details: Because we voted to leave the EU and that vote should be continually honoured!
attributes.background: To stop Starmer's EU Plans from overturning Brexit and taking us back to square one, particularly with EU fishing rights and our economy!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government have not announced any plans to re-join the EU.
